itemData.name: Brilliant Spellthread
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Brilliant Spellthread
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently embroiders spellthread into pants, increasing spell power by 50 and Spirit by 20.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.htmlTooltip:
Sapphire Spellthread
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently embroiders spellthread into pants, increasing spell power by 50 and Stamina by 30.

1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

Shining Spellthread
Requires Level 70

itemData.name: Darkglow Embroidery
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Darkglow Embroidery
Embroiders a magical pattern into your cloak, giving you a chance to restore 400 mana when you cast a spell.

You can only embroider your own cloak and embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

itemData.name: Lightweave Embroidery
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Lightweave Embroidery
Embroiders a subtle pattern of light into your cloak, giving you a chance to increase your spell power by 295 for 15 sec when casting a spell.

Embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

itemData.name: Swordguard Embroidery
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Swordguard Embroidery
Embroiders a magical pattern into your cloak, causing your damaging melee and ranged attacks to sometimes increase your attack power by 400 for 15 sec.

You can only embroider your own cloak and embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

itemData.name: Master's Spellthread
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Master's Spellthread
Permanently embroiders your pants with master's spellthread, increasing spell power by 50 and Stamina by 30.

Only the tailor's pants can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

itemData.name: Sanctified Spellthread
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Sanctified Spellthread
Permanently embroiders your pants with sanctified spellthread, increasing spell power by 50 and Spirit by 20.

Only the tailor's pants can be embroidered, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

Binds when picked up
Requires Level 70

Requires Artisan Riding

1 Charge
